319798.エドアルドは <pc>が採ってきた\n宝石を削って 美しく輝く瞳を作り\nそれを:
Eduardo sharpens the jewel that had brought him, turning them into beautiful, shining pupils. He then attached
them to the eyes of the doll...

319799.「さぁ 目覚めておくれ……愛しき人……。\n 僕の天使……ルーミリアよ！:
Come now, wake up, my beloved...
My angel, Lumeria...!

319800.「……あー。\n 何も 起きねえみたいだな。: Ah, um... Nothing seems to be happenin'.

319801.「どうして！ ようやく 完璧な身体が完成した！\n 身体さえあれば 戻ってきてく:
But why?! I've finally finished this perfect body! With this body you should be able to come back!! So why won't you wake up!?
Lumeriaaaaaa!!

319802.「この町の守護天使様は もう\n いなくなってしまったのでしょうか……？:
Has this town's Guardian Angel already
disappeared...?

319804.「天使像のマギエルさんが 言ってたでしょ。\n 守護天使は 各地で眠ってるって。:
Magiel told us that the Guardian Angels are
sleeping in all different places. They've
gotta be somewhere here in town.

319805.「それに 前にね この町で\n 不思議な存在の気配を感じたの。\n もしかして:
And besides, I felt a mysterious presence in
this town once before... Maybe it was an
angel...?

319806.「……本当かッ！？\n 彼女は 今 どこにいる！\n もったいぶってないで 早く:
Is that true?! Where is she now?!
Out with it already!!

319807.「わかんない……どこにいるかまでは……。\n エドアルドさん やめて……。\n:
I...don't know where it is...
Please stop, Eduardo...you're hurting
me...

319809.「う……僕は いったい……？\n たしか 結晶のバケモノに\n 身体を貫かれて:
W...what am I...? The last thing I remember
I was struck by a crystal-looking monster,
and then...

319810.「良かった……。\n あなたのマネをして 身体を作ってみたのですが\n 上手くで:
Thank goodness... I tried making an exact
copy of your body, but I wasn't sure if I
could do it right...

319811.「新しい身体の具合は いかがですか。\n どこか 痛むところは ありませんか……:
How does your new body feel? Are you feeling
any pain...?

319812.「……はじめまして。\n 私は ルーミリア……です。:
Nice to meet you...
My name...is Lumeria.

319813.「僕は ずっと 待っていたんだ。\n 愛しい人が戻ってくる その時を。\n 町を:
I've been waiting for so long...for the day
that my beloved would finally return.
I protect this town for her sake...

319814.「もう一度 彼女に会うためだったら\n 僕は なんだってやってやる。\n ……だ:
I would do anything just to see her again.
But I'm not able to do it alone...

319815.「どうしても ルーミリアに会いたいんだ。\n キミたちのチカラを 貸してほしい…:
I must see Lumeria again, and I need your
help! Please, I'm begging you...!

319816.「ルーミリアさん……守護天使様は\n いったい どちらにいらっしゃるのでしょう。:
Lumeria... Just where could this Guardian
Angel be? Do you have any ideas, Eduardo?

319817.「うーん……彼女については\n わからないことが多すぎるんだ。内気で\n 自分の:
Hrrmm... There are a lot of things I don't
know about her. She was quite shy and never
really spoke about herself...

319818.「ムニエカ地方の東の高台に かつて\n ルーミリアが暮らしていた小屋がある。そこ:
East of Munieka is a cabin on a cliff where
Lumeria used to live. There may be some
clues left behind there.

319819.「僕も あそこを 散々調べてはみたんだが\n 残念ながら 何もつかめなかった。キ:
I've looked around that place myself, but
sadly wasn't able to find anything. Maybe
you'll have better luck than I did...

319820.「あー でも今は はしごが落ちていて\n 空でも飛ばないと 小屋には行けないんだ:
Ah, but...the ladder is gone, so you'll have
to fly to get to the cabin. Well, I'm sure
you'll figure something out. Yup!

319821.「僕も行きたいところだが 住民の修理の予定が\n 入っていて 手が離せなくてね…:
I'd love to accompany you, but I have to
attend to some repairs for my residents.
Mudara, can you go with them?

319822.「えっと……あの ご主人様……。\n ドロテアは……できれば……。\n そのう…:
Well, um... Master...
If Mudara could, well...

319823.「……いえ なんでもありません。\n みなさまと いっしょに\n ルーミリア様を:
N-no, it's nothing! M-Mudara will join you
in searching for Lumeria...

319824.「ありがとう さすがは 僕のドロテア！\n 必ずや 愛しのルーミリアを\n 見つ:
Oh, thank you! I knew I could count on you,
my Mudara! Surely you will find my beloved
Lumeria!

319825.「……ドロテア 元気ないね。\n どうしたんだろう？:
Mudara doesn't look so good...
What's the matter?

319827.チュピちゃんが 天井に体当たりすると\nなんと 天井の板が外れた！:
Chupie smashes into the ceiling, going right
through the ceiling boards!

319828.チュピちゃんは 天井裏から\n本のようなものを 持ってきた……。:
Chupie then brings what appears to be a book
from the attic...

319829.「……かーっ！ まさか\n 天井裏なんかに 隠してやがったとはな。\n どこ探し:
Jeez! To think they hid somethin' like that
up in the ceiling. No wonder we couldn't
find it.

319830.「どうやら これも\n ルーミリアさんの日記のようですね。\n さっそく 読んで:
Apparently this is also one of Lumeria's
diaries. Let's have a look...

319831.「私の名は ルーミリア……。\n かつて ムニエカの守護天使と\n 呼ばれていた:
"My name is Lumeria... I was once called
the Guardian Angel of Munieka..."

319832.ジア・クト念晶体と名乗る 侵略者による\n襲撃の果てに ムニエカの町は\nそこに:
"After an attack by invaders calling
themselves the Dia Kut Telecrystal, Munieka
was destroyed along with its inhabitants."

319833.理不尽な運命から なんとしても\n愛する住民たちを救いたかった 私は\n彼らに:
"I wanted to save my beloved people at any
cost, so I gave them all new vessels...
The bodies of dolls..."

319834.ムニエカ地方の森に残された 創生のチカラで\n彼らの魂と 人形の身体を結びつけ\:
"With the power of creation left within the forests near Munieka, I succeeded in connecting their souls with the dolls,
which brought them back to life."

319835.「エドアルドさんが 話していた通りだ。\n やっぱり ルーミリアさんが\n 守護:
Just as Eduardo said! Lumeria is a Guardian
Angel after all!

319836.神が創りたもうた人間と 寸分違わぬ身体を\n全員分作るのは 途方もない作業でした:
"It was a tremendous undertaking to create bodies that were exactly like the humans the Almighty had created...but with his help,
I was able to do so."

319837.長い長い時を経て ついに 私たちは\n愛する故郷ムニエカを 取り戻したのです。\:
"And finally, after so, so long...my beloved
homeland of Munieka returned once more.
I was so happy, that I could not stop crying."

319838.私たちは 決して 朽ちることのない\n永遠の平和と安寧を 手に入れた。\nこれで:
"We have gained eternal peace and tranquility
that will never perish. We can all live
happily ever after."

319839.けれど……ひとつだけ 気がかりがあります。\n今はまだ 小さな染みだけれど 捨て:
"However...there is just one thing that worries me. It is but a small stain now, but left unchecked it could gnaw away
at everyone and bring disaster to the town."

319840.ムニエカの地下にある 私の秘密の場所……。\nしばらくは そこに こもりきりにな:
"My secret place is underneath Munieka... I will be staying there for some time. Its keys shall be entrusted to three chosen
inhabitants."

319841.もう二度と ムニエカの町を……\n愛する人々を 失いたくはない。\n今度こそ 皆:
"I don't want to lose Munieka again...
the people that I love. This time, I have
to protect them..."

319842.「この後に 鍵の取り出し方が 書いてある！\n ……む～？ なんか へんてこりん:
After that, it looks like instructions on
where to get those keys! Hmm...it seems
a bit strange, though.

319843.「ルーミリアさんが 町のどこかに\n 今もいるのだとすれば……まだ捜していない\:
If Lumeria is still somewhere in town, then...
isn't it likely that they're somewhere we
haven't searched yet? Such as underground?

319844.「地下への入り口が どこにあるかまでは\n 現段階では わかりませんが まずは\:
We don't know where the entrance is just yet,
but first we should find those keys that the
diary mentioned.

319845.「鍵を託されたのは セアトロさん オルーサさん\n ロベールさんの３人。彼らに:
The keys were entrusted to Seatro, Orusa and
Robere. If we follow the instructions
in the diary, then they will give us the keys.

319846.「あれ？ セアトロさんと オルーサさんは\n わかるんですけど ロベールさん……:
Huh? I know of Seatro and Orusa, but...
R-Robere? I don't think he lives in town...

319847.「……とりあえず 順番通り セアトロさんに\n 日記の指示を 試してみましょうか:
Well, in the meantime...let's go in order in
the diary and try Seatro's instructions first.
I'll leave the diary with you.

319850.「ドロテア？ えっと……何かあった？\n ルーミリアさんを 捜すことになってから:
Mudara? Umm...what's wrong? Ever since
we started looking for Lumeria, you've
looked really down...

319851.「あ <pc>様 ポルテ様……。\n ご心配をおかけし 申し訳ございません。:
Ah, <pc>, Porte...
A-apologies for causing you to
worry...

319852.「ルーミリア様のことを考えると\n 胸のこのあたりが 締めつけられるように\n:
When Mudara thinks of Lumeria, she feels a
tight pain in her chest, right here...
It's quite strange for just a doll...

319853.「ルーミリア様が 帰ってきたら ご主人様は\n お喜びになるでしょう。でも ドロ:
The Master will be so happy when Lumeria
comes back. But, for some reason, Mudara
is very afraid of that...

319854.「大好きなご主人様の 心からの願いなのに\n こんな風に 考えてしまうなんて\n:
How ungrateful Mudara is to think such things
about my beloved Master's most heartfelt
wishes...

319855.だいじなものから ルーミリアの日記を使い\n住民たちから 鍵を手に入れる手順を\:
For instructions on how to get the keys from
each resident, check out Lumeria's Diary
in your Key Items.

319859.「地下へおりる 階段があるな。\n かなり深くまで 続いているようだが……。:
There's stairs there that go underground.
Looks like they go pretty far down...

319860.「うう 寒い……。\n 前に 結晶の森で感じたのと同じだ。\n この先から 冷た:
Ugh, I'm cold... This is the same way I felt
in the Crystalline Forest. I sense something
cold and sad up ahead...

319861.「私……この場所 知ってる……。\n ずっとずっと 昔に 来たことがある……？:
I... I know this place...
A long, long time ago...?

319863.「なんだいこりゃ……びっくり仰天だ！\n まさか 毎日見てる広場に\n こんな仕:
And what is THIS?! ...I never would have
guessed that such a device would be hidden
in plain sight in this plaza!

319864.「ルーミリアの家で 何か\n 手がかりが 見つかったんだろう？\n 早く 見せて:
You found something in Lumeria's house,
didn't you?! Come now, show me!

319866.「……<pc>？\n イジワルするのは 良くないと思うな。:
Uh, <pc>...? I don't think now's
the time to be messing around.

319869.「マーベラスッ！ 初めて会ったときから\n 天使のように可憐な人だと 思っていた:
Maaaarvelous! From the first time I laid my eyes upon you, I thought you were as lovely as an angel...but to think you really ARE
one...!

319870.「町の中で まだ 捜していない場所は\n 日記に書いてあった 秘密の場所だけです:
The only place we've yet to search here is the secret place mentioned in that diary. Perhaps Lumeria's soul is somewhere in
there...

319871.「でかしたぞッ 諸君！\n では さっそく 我が麗しの天使を\n 迎えにいくとし:
Beautifully done, everyone! Now then, let's
go and give my beautiful angel a warm
welcome!

319874.「ア……俺の身体は ドコダ……？\n 人形の身体じゃなイ 人間のカラダ……。\n:
W...wHERe is my body...? It's a human
BODy, not a doLL... It was...DesTROYED
by a monSTEr made of crysTAL...

319875.「何千年も 何万年も\n アタシは５歳のまま。時ガ止まったまま……。\n ネエ:
For tens of thousands of years... I've stayed
five years old. TIMe has stopped...
Hey, HoW long will this laST...?

319876.「アア アンタたちの 生きてる身体……\n キレイだネェ うらやましイネェ……。:
OoOoH... Your LiVIng bodies... They aRE so
beautiful... I'm so JEAlous... Please, givE
tHem to US...!

319877.「ゲゲッ！？ こんなときに\n みんなそろって 故障かよ！ おいエドアルド！\n:
Yikes! Everyone just so happens to break down
right now?! Hey, Eduardo! You aren't behind
this again, are you?!

319878.「誓って 何もしていないとも！\n 毎日のメンテナンスも 欠かさず\n おこなっ:
I swear it wasn't me! I did my daily
maintenance as usual, and there were no
issues!

319879.「うう……少しでも早く ルーミリアのもとへ\n 向かいたいところだが 町のみんな:
Ugh... I want to see Lumeria as soon as I can,
but I can't just leave everyone like this,
either...

319880.「キミたち 悪いが 先に行ってくれないか？\n みんなを修理したら 僕も\n す:
Would you all mind going on ahead? I'll be
right behind you as soon as I can get everyone
fixed up!

319882.「ドロテアは 知っていました……。\n みんなが こうなることも 全部……。\n:
Mudara knew... She knew this was going to
happen to everyone... Why... Why...?

319883.「これは……？\n ルーミリアさんは この場所で\n いったい 何を……。:
What is...? What could Lumeria possibly be
doing in a place like this...

319886.「……ええっ ルーミリアさん！？\n こ こんな あっさり\n 見つかっちゃって:
Huh? Lumeria?!
I..is it okay that we found her so easily...?

319887.「いえ ポルテ様……。\n これは まぼろしです。\n この地に封じられし 守護:
No, Porte... This is just an illusion.
The memories of a Guardian Angel
sealed inside this land...

319896.「町で感じた悪寒は これだったんだ……。\n ムニエカのみんなが 長い間\n た:
That chill I felt in town, it was this...
The corrupted souls of everyone in
Munieka...

319897.「永遠の生命なんて どだい 無茶な話なんだ。\n どうにもならないことを 無理や:
All this talk of eternal life is ridiculous. Tryin' to force something that will never work will always end bad. Doesn't matter
how hard you try.

319898.「ルーミリアさんは……間違えたのでしょう。\n 愛する者を 守ろうとするあまり\:
I think...Lumeria must have made a mistake.
In trying to protect those she loved, she
lost sight of what was truly important.

319899.「かつての私も オルストフさまを……\n 竜族を救いたい一心で 過ちを犯しました:
In the past, I too made the same mistake with Orstov...it was my single-minded desire to save the Nadravians. I understand her
feelings all too well.

319900.「このまま 放っておいたら\n 町のみんなは どうなっちゃうんだろう……。:
I wonder what's gonna happen to everyone in
town if we don't do something...

319901.「それこそ ロクな結果にならんだろうさ。\n この先にいるはずの ルーミリア本人:
It's not gonna end well, that's for sure. Lumeria should be just up ahead, so we'll just have to let her do something about it.
Let's get goin'!

319904.「ここにも 上の階と同じように\n ルーミリアさんの記憶が\n 残ってるみたいだ:
Looks like Lumeria's memories are kept here
too, just like on the upper floor...

319917.「町の様子を見るに ルーミリアが姿を消す前に\n 浄化装置は 完成したようだが…:
Based on the state of the town, it seems
Lumeria was able to finish that purification
system before she disappeared...

319918.「ルーミリアは 住民たちの悪意に\n 耐えることが できなかったんだろう。\n:
She probably couldn't handle the spite from
everyone, so maybe that's why she
disappeared...

319919.「……卑怯者！ 自分のしたことに 向き合わず\n 被害者ぶって 勝手に逃げて！\:
...You COWARD! You never faced up to your actions, you played the victim, and you just ran away! All of this happened because
you were so weak!

319920.「あなたのせいで 町のみんなは……\n エドアルド様は 今も 苦しんでいるのに！:
Because of you, everyone in town is...
Even Master Eduardo is suffering!
I... I HATE YOU!!!

319922.「お おい！ どうしたんだ ドロテア……。\n お前さんらしく ないじゃないか。:
H-hey! What's that all about, Mudara...?
This ain't like you at all.

319923.「いえ……これが 本当の私なんです。\n 臆病で 性根の腐った 汚くて醜い私……:
No...this is the real me. A cowardly, rotten,
filthy, ugly me... This whole time, I've tried
to just ignore it...

319924.「……先に 進みましょう。\n ルーミリア……見つけなければ……。:
We should keep going...
Lumeria...we have to find her...

319926.「ルーミリアが話していた\n 浄化の聖花石ってのは アレか……？:
Is this that Purifying Flowerstone that
Lumeria mentioned...?

319927.「ええ……そして あのモヤのようなものが\n 町の人々から吸収した 魂のケガレ…:
Yes...and that fog-like thing is the
corruption from all the residents' absorbed
souls...

319928.「うっ……町のみんなの 負の感情が\n 流れ込んでくる。ルーミリアさんは\n 毎:
Hnng... I can just feel the negative feelings
of everyone from town... Lumeria had to
deal with this every single day...?

319929.「ケガレが たまりすぎて\n 浄化しきれなくなってしまっている……。\n 一刻も:
The corruption has accumulated too much to
be able to purify... We have to deal with it
right away...

319930.「ですが ルーミリアさんの魂らしきものは\n どこにも 見あたりません。\n こ:
But we weren't able to find Lumeria's soul.
I thought that she would be here of all
places...

319931.「やぁやぁ 諸君！ おまたせー！: Hello hello, everyone! Sorry to keep you!

319932.「さあ ルーミリアは どこにいるんだい？\n 人形も連れてきたし 準備万端だ！\:
So, where is Lumeria? I've brought the doll,
and all the preparations are complete!
No need to be shy! Go on, tell me!

319933.「どこだい？ 僕のルーミリア！\n 見てくれ キミの身体を 作ったんだよ。\n:
Where are you, my Lumeria? Look, I've
created your body for you! You don't need
to hide. Come on out!

319935.「そこだね！\n 今行くよ ルーミリア！:
So that's where you are!
I'm coming for you, my Lumeria!

319936.「エドアルドさん！？ それは違うの！\n すごく 危険なものだから\n 近づいち:
Eduardo!! Don't! You should stay away from
that thing, it's super dangerous!

319937.「ハッハッハッハッ！ 何を言っているんだい？\n ほらごらん この身体に入りたが:
Hahahaha! What are you on about? Look...
Lumeria wants to enter this body...and she
wants to see me!

319938.「バカなこと 言ってんじゃねえ！\n そんなヤバそうなの どう見たって\n 天使:
Don't be ridiculous! There's no way something
that looks like THAT is an angel!

319939.「……うるさいッ！\n この僕が 間違えるはずがないだろう！\n ここにいるのは:
SHUT UP! There's NO way I could make a mistake
here! Lumeria IS here! I'm sure of it!

319940.「あああ うんざり うんざりだッ！\n 僕は こんなに 努力しているのに\n い:
Ohh...I'm just...so sick of this! I've been
trying so hard, but no matter how long I
wait for you...you don't come back!

319941.「毎日毎日毎日 変わりばえのない 退屈な日々。\n 愛しいキミがいない町で 木偶:
Day after day after day... It's the same old
routine. Taking care of these dolls in a town
without you...I just can't bear it any longer!

319942.「そうさ 他のヤツらなんて どうだっていい。\n ルーミリア……キミだけがいれば:
That's right... I don't care what happens to
the others. I only care about YOU, Lumeria...!
Haha... Hahahahaha!

319944.「ケガレに 近づいたからです。\n エドアルド様は 誰よりも\n この町に 尽く:
He got too close to the corruption.
Master Eduardo has done more for this
town than anyone else has...

319945.「誰よりも 魂をすり減らし\n ケガレの影響を 受けやすかった彼を\n ここには:
His soul was more worn out and prone to
corruption than anyone else... That's why
I didn't want him coming here.

319946.「エドアルド様……。\n それ以上 ケガレに 近づいてはなりません。\n あなた:
Master Eduardo... Please do not go any closer
to that corruption. Your soul will shatter...

319947.「私は 貴方を 失いたくない。\n 貴方を 愛しているから……。\n お願いです:
I...don't want to lose you.
Because...I love you...
Please, you have to come back!

319948.「……僕とルーミリアの 邪魔をするな。\n お前のような クソ人形の言うことなど:
How dare you get in the way of me and my
Lumeria! Who would listen to a garbage
doll like you, anyway?

319951.「ああ なんと 美しい……。\n やっと 帰ってきてくれたんだね。\n 僕のルー:
Oh, it's so beautiful...
You've finally come back...
My Lumeria!

319952.「ル ルルル ルーミリァ……。\n ワタシ ルーミリア？\n キャハッ キャハハ:
LU... LU LU LU... LUMERIA...
I... LUMERIA?
AHA... AHAHAHAHA!!

319953.「聞コエル 町ノ ミンナノ声！\n ミンナ コンナ身体 モウ嫌ダッテ！\n 早ク:
I HEAR THE VOICES OF THE TOWN!
I DON'T WANT THIS BODY ANY LONGER!
HURRY AND FREE US!

319954.「……なんだって！？ キミと僕のおかげで\n 死なずに済んだっていうのに\n な:
What?! Thanks to both you and me, the people
didn't have to die! How ungrateful they are!

319955.「そうだ！ そんなに この暮らしが\n 気に食わないって言うなら お望みどおり\:
I got it! If you hate life this much, then
I'll just have to grant your wish and scrap
you!

319956.「キミが 帰ってきた以上\n あんな出来損ないの人形たちなんて 必要ない！\n:
Now that you're back with me, there's no longer a need for these worthless dolls! Let's destroy them all, and live happily
together!

319957.「キャハッ スクラップ スクラップ！\n ミンナ コワス！ タノシイ タノシイナ:
KYAHA! SCRAP, SCRAP!
BREAK EVERYONE! HOW FUN, HOW FUN!

319958.「……チッ！ おい ポルテ！\n 俺から 離れるんじゃねえぞ！:
Tch! Hey, Porte!
Stay close to me!

319960.「住民たちの魂のケガレは\n すべて 浄化しました。:
The corruption of the residents' souls has
been completely purged.

319961.「ムニエカの町は 本当に美しい。\n みんな いつも 幸せそうに笑っていて……。:
Munieka truly is beautiful, everyone always
so happy and smiling... I wanted to preserve
this radiance forever...

319962.「ですが それは 大きな間違いでした。\n 終わりがあるからこそ ヒトは\n 限:
But that was a huge mistake. It is precisely
because human life has an end that they
try to live happily with their limited time.

319963.「だからこそ 町もヒトも 輝いて見えた。\n 私は 人々の生命の輝きに\n 魅せ:
That is why this town and its people seemed
so radiant. I suppose I was fascinated by the
brilliance of their lives.

319964.「申し遅れました。我が名は ルーミリア。\n 偉大なる主神 グランゼニスより\n:
I apologize for the delay. My name is Lumeria. I am a Guardian Angel, and I was entrusted with this land of Munieka by the great
Gran Zenith.

319965.「まさか ドロテアが 守護天使で\n こーんなキレイな おねーさんだったなんて\:
I never expected that Mudara would be a
Guardian Angel and such a beautiful lady...
What a surprise that was!

319966.「あっ もちろん あの姿のドロテアも\n かわいくて 大好きだけどね！:
Ah, and of course, Mudara's appearance was
so cute too!

319967.「でへへ……キレイで かわいいなんて……\n あ ありがとうございますぅ……。\:
Ehehe... Beautiful and cute...?
T...thank you so much...
I'm...I'm so happy....

319968.「ところで あのう……。\n なぜ 皆さまは 私を\n 捜していたのでしょうか…:
Um, by the way... Why were you all looking
for me in the first place?

319969.「守護天使マギエル様が 私を……？\n 招集の時が 近いということでしょうか……:
So Magiel is calling out to me?
Does that mean the time of us convening
is near...?

319970.「では こちらを お受け取りください。\n マギエル様から おあずかりしていたも:
Well, please accept this. It was given to me
by Magiel, but I'm sure that you will find
some use for it.

319972.「それから……\n これは 私からの 感謝の気持ちです。: Also...this is a thank you from me.

319973.「ねえ ルーミリア。聞いてもいい……？\n ムニエカの町の人たちは\n これから:
Hey, Lumeria... Can I ask...?
What's gonna happen to everyone in Munieka
now?

319974.「ご主人様……エドアルドさんが これまで\n 皆さんの身体を 修理していましたが:
Master... Um, Eduardo was the one who repaired
everyone's bodies. But now, there's no one
here who can do that anymore.

319975.「おそらく 百年も経たず 身体が朽ち……\n 住民たちの魂は 人形から解放され\:
I suppose that within a hundred years or so,
their bodies will break down and their souls
will be free to pass on.

319976.「地下にある聖花石は 作動していますから\n 人形が朽ちる前に 魂に\n ケガレ:
The Flowerstone is functioning, so I don't
think there's any danger of corruption
before they do break down.

319977.「ムニエカは……終わりの時を 待つのみとなる。\n それが この町の 本来あるべ:
Munieka...it now only awaits its end.
That is how it should've been from the
start...

319978.「本当は今すぐ 私の手で みんなを\n 眠らせてあげるべきなのかも しれません。:
Perhaps I should intervene and just let you
all sleep peacefully right now. But...

319980.「皆さま ムニエカの町を お守りくださり\n 本当に ありがとうございます。\n:
Thank you all so much for protecting Munieka.
I will never forget this kindness.

319981.「時が来たら お呼びください。\n どこであろうと 必ず はせ参じます。:
When the time comes, please call me.
I will be there, no matter where you are.

319982.「どうか 貴方たちの人生が 最後の瞬間まで\n 幸せなものでありますように……。:
May your lives be filled with happiness,
even until the very last moment...

319984.「……良かったんだよ。\n この物語は ここで終わらせるべきなんだ。\n そう:
It was. This story should end here.
We just gotta believe that, right?

319985.残りの守護天使を 目覚めさせるため\nほかの町へ 向かおう。:
Head to another town to awaken the remaining
Guardian Angels.

319986.これで ３人の守護天使を 目覚めさせた。\nはじまりの地へ 戻ろう。:
Now that the three Guardian Angels have been
awakened, head back to the Land of
Beginnings.

319987.「貴様らァ……よくも 僕のルーミリアをぉ……。\n 許さん……許さんぞぉッ！:
You... How dare you touch my Lumeria...
You... You will pay for this!!

319988.「エドアルドさん 違うんです……。\n それは ルーミリアさんじゃない！\n 信:
No, Eduardo... That is not Lumeria!
You must believe me!

319989.「ハッ だまされないぞ……。\n 僕から ルーミリアを奪おうと\n 嘘をついてい:
Heh! You can't fool me!
You're just lying so you can take my
Lumeria away from me, is that it?!

319990.「彼女は 誰にも渡さない。僕だけのものだ。\n ふたりで 永遠に 幸せに暮らすん:
No one else can save her. She's mine, and mine
alone! The two of us will live happily,
forever... Aha... Ahahahaha!

319992.「ギ ギギ……デキソコナイノ ニンギョウ\n ゼンブ スクラップ……オマエモ！\:
Whrrrrr.... WORTHLESS DOLLS, ALL SCRAP...
YOU, TOO!
KYAHAHAHAHAHA!

319995.「ああ 違う。\n この美しくて 優しい光……。\n キミは……キミこそが……:
No, this...
This beautiful, gentle light...
You...you're...

319997.「浄化の聖花石を作るため チカラのすべてを\n 使い果たした私は 自らの存在すら:
I had used all my energy to create the
Purifying Flowerstone, and could no longer
sustain even my own existence...

319998.「消えかけていたところを\n 貴方の作った人形に 入りこんで\n どうにか 生き:
I was on the brink of fading away, but was
able to enter the doll that you had made
and continue to exist somehow.

319999.「自分が 何者であるのかも忘れ……\n 真実から 目をそむけてきた……。:
I have forgotten who I am and I...and I have
turned a blind eye to the truth...

320000.「恐ろしかったんです。\n 死という現実を受け入れ すべてを……\n 大好きな貴:
I was afraid... To accept the reality of
death, of losing everything...of losing
you, the person that I loved so much...

320001.「でも どれだけつらくても 向きあわなくては。\n これ以上 ムニエカの民を\n:
But no matter how difficult, we must face it.
I cannot allow Munieka's people to suffer
any longer.

320002.「これは……私の罪。\n すべて 受けとめます。:
This is...my sin. I accept full
responsibility.

320004.「ルーミリア……君は\n ずっと そばに いてくれたんだね……。\n それなのに:
Lumeria... You were by my side all along...
And yet I still didn't even notice...

320005.「ホント バカだよねぇ……。\n あまりに バカすぎて 笑っちゃうよ。\n アハ:
I'm a real idiot, huh... I can't help but
laugh at how stupid I was...
Aha...haha...

320006.「ごめんなさい……私のせいで みんなを……\n 貴方を 長い間 苦しませてしまっ:
I'm sorry...I have caused everyone...caused
you so much pain for so long...
I'm sorry... I'm so sorry...

320007.「どうして 謝るんだい？ キミは\n 僕たちの命を救い 心から愛してくれた。\n:
Why are you apologizing? You saved our lives
and loved us all so much. We may have had
some hard times, but we were happy...

320008.「ねえ 見てくれたかい？ キミの愛した町を。\n 美しいだろう？ キミの喜ぶ顔が:
Hey, did you see it? That town that you love
so much? Isn't it beautiful? I tried so hard
to make you happy...

320009.「だからさ どうか 笑っておくれ……。\n ね ルーミリア……。:
So, please... Smile for me...
Okay, Lumeria...?

320010.「……そう その顔だ。 \n ずっと その顔が見たくて 僕は……:
That's it...that face...
That's what I've always wanted to see...

320011.「エドアルドさんの魂が砕けて……消えちゃった。\n 攻撃とケガレに 耐えられなか:
Eduardo's soul has shattered... He's gone.
He couldn't withstand the attacks and
the corruption...

320012.「……彼は 長い間ずっと ムニエカの町を\n 守り続けていました。こんな\n ボ:
He had been protecting Munieka for so long...
To end up like this, all just for me...

320013.「彼の魂は もう どこにもいない。\n 二度と よみがえらせることは できません:
His soul is gone. It cannot be brought back
again. I will never...see him again...

323661.「町の人たちのことを想うなら……\n あなたはもう 手を出すべきじゃない。\n:
If you care about the townspeople that much...
then I think you should let things be. Trust
them and leave them to themselves.

323662.「これで……良かったのかな。: So, I guess...this was a good thing.

325662.<center>ここは 愛しい ムニエカの住民たちを\n見守り 管理するため 作:
This place was created to watch over and
manage the residents of my beloved Munieka.
It's my secret place.

325663.<center>我が名は ルーミリア……。\n偉大なる 主神グランゼニスから\n:
My name is Lumeria...
An angel tasked by the great Gran Zenith
to watch over Munieka.

325664.<center>ジア・クト念晶体の襲来から\nどれだけの月日が 経ったでしょう…:
How much time has passed since the Dia
Kut Telecrystal attacked...?

325665.<center>毎日 この場所で 住民たちの様子を見守り\n細心の注意を 払って:
I watched over the residents' dailies lives from this place, paying close attention to them... However, what I feared most has
finally happened.

325666.<center>ある日 突然 住民のひとりが\n異常な言動を取りはじめ その果て:
One day, one resident suddenly began behaving
erratically, eventually destroying their doll
body and ending their own life...

325667.<center>人形の身体となった 住民たちは\n歳を取らず 死も迎えない……不:
Those in the bodies of dolls do not age and
do not die...they are immortal. Their lives
remained unchanged for many, many years.

325668.<center>流れぬ水が にごりゆくのと同じように\n時の流れをせき止められた:
Just as water that does not flow stagnates,
so too has the flow of time stopped, festering
a deep corruption within their souls...

325669.<center>住民たちに異常が出るたび ひとりひとり\n浄化を施しましたが……:
Whenever a resident would show an abnormality, they would be purified. However...no matter how many times they were purified, their
souls would continue to accumulate this corruption.

325670.<center>このままでは 浄化が追いつかず\n住民たちの魂は 皆 闇に堕ちて:
If this continues, purification will become less and less feasible, and the souls of the residents will fall to darkness and turn
into monsters...

325671.<center>もう二度と ムニエカの町を\n愛する者たちを 失いたくありません:
I don't want to lose my beloved people of
Munieka again... I must finish that as soon
as possible...

325672.<center>住民たちの魂のケガレに 対処するため\n私は 町の地下に ケガレ:
To deal with the souls of the residents, I decided to build a device underneath the town that would absorb and purify the
souls of those who suffered.

325673.<center>守護天使である私の ありったけのチカラを\nこの聖花石にこめ 町:
As a Guardian Angel, I will imbue all of my
power into this Flowerstone, to absorb and
purify all of the town's corruption.

325674.<center>浄化の聖花石の完成まで あともう少し……。\n身体も精神も 限界:
I am very close to completing this Purifying Flowerstone... Both my body and spirit are reaching their limit, but I must go on even
if it means losing everything.

325675.<center>ムニエカの住民たちの……\n愛する人の笑顔を 守るために。\nだ:
To protect the smiles of my beloved people
of Munieka... However...

325676.<center>住民たちは ケガレから生じる絶望を\n抑えることができず そのす:
The residents could not suppress their despair
that was caused by the corruption, and
directed all their emotions towards me.

325677.<center>どうして 自分たちは 理不尽に殺され\nこんなに苦しんでまで 生:
"Why did we have to be killed so senselessly,
only to live in such suffering? It's so sad
and so infuriating."

325678.<center>お前さえ この町に来なければ……。\nこの……疫病神め とも……:
"If only you hadn't come to this town...
You...cursed, god of corruption..."

325679.<center>毎日のように 住民たちから\n罵倒の言葉を浴びせられる。魂のケガ:
Every day, I am subjected to verbal abuse by the residents. I understand that this is only temporary and caused by the stain on their
souls...

325680.<center>聖花石さえ完成すれば 元の優しい皆さんに\n戻ってくれる。わかっ:
As long as the Flowerstone is completed, then everyone will return to their kind selves. I should know this, and yet...everything before
me grows dark...

325681.<center>どうして こんなことになってしまったのだろう。\n私はただ あの:
How could I have let this happen?
I didn't want to lose this happiness.
I wanted the person I love to smile...

325682.<center>もう……何も 考えたくない……。\n皆が言うように こんな私\n:
I don't...want to think about anything
anymore... I should do what everyone
says, and just disappear...

325683.<center>ごめんなさい エドアルドさん。\n貴方と交わした約束は もう\n:
I'm sorry, Eduardo... I may not be able to
keep my promise to you anymore...
